strategy: Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warriors, Harlequins, Crimson Hunters, Skathach Wraithknights and the Avatar formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Craftworld Lugganath, with Corsair support and Harlequin allies from the Masque of the Veiled Path.

formations.name: 0-1 Avatar
formations.units: One Avatar

formations.name: 1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Warhosts/Wraithhosts
sections.description: Up to one Lugganath Wraithhost for each Lugganath Warhost

formations.name: Lugganath Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer, four Guardians, five Venoms

formations.name: Lugganath Wraithhost
formations.units: One Spiritseer, four Wraithreapers, four Wave Serpents

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Troupes
sections.description: Up to one Lugganath Troupe for each Lugganath Warhost/Wraithhost

formations.name: Corsair Aufkl√§rers
formations.units: Four Ghost Walkers
extraUnits: Replace four Ghost Walkers with four Wasp Walkers: Free

formations.name: Beritten Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Three Wave Serpents and six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions

formations.name: Fire Prism Troupe
formations.units: Three Fire Prisms

formations.name: Swords of Vaul
formations.units: Five Falcons
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free
Add five Guardians to the formation: 50 points

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: Any one of the following units: Cobra, Storm Serpent, Scorpion
extraUnits: Add up to any two of the following units for 200 points each: Cobra, Storm Serpent, Scorpion

sections.name: Masque of the Veiled Path Saedaths
sections.description: Up to one Veiled Path Saedath for each Lugganath Warhost/Wraithhost

formations.name: Cegorach's Escape
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, two Harlequin Troupes, one Death Jesters, three Starweavers

formations.name: Serpent's Scales
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, three Skyweavers, two Voidweavers

formations.name: Devourer's Hunt
formations.units: One Master Mime, six Mimes

formations.name: Cegorach's Revenge
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, two Harlequin Troupes, two Death Jesters, four Starweavers, three Skyweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Devourer's Feast
formations.units: One Master Mime, one Solitaire, eight Mimes

formations.name: 0-1 Ynnead's Dream
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, one Shadowseer, three Harlequin Troupes, three Death Jesters, six Starweavers

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Skathach Wraithknights
formations.units: Two Skathach Wraithknights (may not mix configurations)

formations.name: Crimson Aerie
formations.units: Two Nightshade Interceptors

formations.name: Hemlock Aerie
formations.units: Two Hemlock Wraithfighters

formations.name: Corsair Vampire Hunter
formations.units: One Corsair Vampire Hunter

formations.name: 0-1 Spacecraft
formations.units: One Wraithship

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Autarch
items.description: Add an Eldar Autarch character to a Farseer or Aspect Warriors unit

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Exarch character to an Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Windriders
items.description: Add up to three Vypers or Eldar Jetbikes
